oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Jim Vest and Friends Studio Demos
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The recording is of Jim Vest (musician), Vern Gosdin (musician) and other unidentified artists. The recordings were created at the Columbia Recording Studios, in Nashville, Tennessee, for Boone Records. The recording takes place on an unidentified date.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Jim Vest; Vern Gosdin
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Old Fashioned Way (Jim Vest and Friends) -- (02:25) Old Fashioned Way (Jim Vest and Friends) -- (04:45) I Love My Jesus (Jim Vest and Friends) -- (07:37) I Love My Jesus (Jim Vest and Friends) -- (10:18) Leaving is Just Round the Corner (Jim Vest and Friends) -- (12:59) LeAnna (Vern Gosdin) -- (16:09) LeAnna (Vern Gosdin) -- (19:17) My Jesus Told Me So (Vern Gosdin) -- (21:50) Save Something For You (Jim Vest and Friends) -- (24:18) One of These Days (Jim Vest and Friends) -- (26:27) This Ain't No Candy Store (Jim Vest and Friends)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Vest, Jim; Gosdin, Vern;
